text: Ɓaluke Zelemi wooiti kalani sɛʋɛ ɓiligi zu, é wooɠula la, naama nuiti kpein gaazu niiti ti ɠɛni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi ma ɠoizuʋɛ. É ɠɛni loni pɛlɛi naa wu, nii é veeni Gemalia ya, Safan ná-doun zunui, nii ɠɛni ga zou zɛʋɛ ɠɛ nui. Naama ʋɛlɛi ɠɛni loni GALA sei ʋɛlɛi ma ɠoizuʋɛ yeemaazuʋɛ, Pɛlɛla Niinɛi ɠobaʋɛ.
